english.segment1: You know she's one in a million. One of the few that night. I'm going to ask her the question. Can anyone tow this line
english.segment2: [Chorus]. She's on the first line, keeping everybody in tow. She's on the first line, keeping everybody in tow
english.segment3: She's only moving lightly, Keeping her back up straight. You know she's breaking the rules, But someone knows how to play this game.
english.segment4: She's on the first line, keeping everybody in tow. She's on the first line, keeping everybody in tow. I've got a feeling she could be alone all night. I've got a feeling she could be alone all night.
english.segment5: Like a bull at a gate, Jumped the gun like I've always done. Tripped head over heels. Cold feelings surround me
english.segment6: I've got a feeling she could be alone all night. I've got a feeling she could be alone all night.
